import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'
import { Group } from '@vx/group'
import { LinePath } from '@vx/shape'
import { scaleTime, scaleLinear } from '@vx/scale'
import { AxisLeft, AxisBottom } from '@vx/axis'
import { line } from 'd3-shape'
import { extent, max } from 'd3-array'
import { select } from 'd3-selection'

function Compa() {
  const [data, setData] = useState([])

  useEffect(() => {
    (async() => {
      let a = await axios.get('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nychealth/coronavirus-data/master/case-hosp-death.csv')
      let res = await a.data
  
      let 
        dump = [],
        lines = res.replace('DATE_OF_INTEREST', 'date').split('\r'),
        headers = lines[0].split(',')

      for (let i = 1; i < lines.length; i++) {
        let
          obj = {},
          line = lines[i].replace('\n', ''),
          curLine = line.split(',')
    
        for (var j = 0; j < headers.length; j++) {
          obj[headers[j].toLowerCase()] = curLine[j]
        }
    
        dump.push(obj)
      }

      setData(dump)
    })()
  }, [])
  
  const 
    width = window.innerWidth / 2,
    height = window.innerHeight / 2,
    xMax = width,
    yMax = height

  const 
    y = d => d.new_covid_case_count,
    y2 = d => d.hospitalized_case_count,
    y3 = d => d.death_count

  const
    dataLine = line()
      .x((value, index) => new Date(value.date))
      .y((value) => value.new_covid_case_count)

  const xScale = scaleTime({
    range: [0, xMax],
    domain: extent(data, x)
  })

  const yScale = scaleLinear({
    range: [yMax, 0],
    domain: [0, max(data, y)],
  })

  return (
    <>
      <svg width={width} height={height}> 
        <rect x={0} y={0} width={width} height={height} fill="#fbc2eb" rx={14} />

      </svg>
    </>
  )
}

export default Compa
